mapper.select: SELECT if(MAX(SEQ) is null,1,MAX(SEQ)) FROM PAY_VIEW

SELECT COUNT(SEQ) FROM PAY_VIEW WHERE TO_DAYS(#{today}) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(STARTTIME) AND TO_DAYS(ENDTIME)
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sText}, '%')
AND CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sText}, '%')
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sText}, '%')

SELECT SEQ as seq, EMAIL as email, WRITER as writer, TITLE as title, STARTTIME as starttime, ENDTIME as endtime FROM PAY_VIEW WHERE (TO_DAYS(STARTTIME) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(#{sDay}) AND TO_DAYS(LAST_DAY(#{eDay})) OR TO_DAYS(ENDTIME) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(#{sDay}) AND TO_DAYS(LAST_DAY(#{eDay})) OR TO_DAYS(#{sDay}) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(STARTTIME) AND TO_DAYS(ENDTIME)) AND EMAIL = #{write} ORDER BY STARTTIME ASC
SELECT SEQ as seq, EMAIL as email, WRITER as writer, TITLE as title, STARTTIME as starttime, ENDTIME as endtime, REGTIME as regtime, UPTIME as uptime, ETCYN as etcYn FROM PAY_VIEW WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY ( SEQ, WRITER, TITLE, pay_day, pay_ot, pay_ottime, pay_latetime, pay_nighttime, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, ETC_YN, REGTIME, UPTIME ) VALUES ( #{seq}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{pay_day}, #{pay_ot}, #{pay_ottime}, #{pay_latetime}, #{pay_nighttime}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{etcYn}, NOW(), NOW() )

INSERT INTO PAY_DATA ( USER_EMAIL, PAY_DATE, TIME_SALARY, JOB_TIME, FULL_WORKING_PENSION, FAMILY_PENSION, POSITION_PENSION, LONGEVITY_PENSION, TEXES, REGTIME, UPTIME ) VALUES ( #{user_email}, #{pay_date}, #{time_salary}, #{job_time}, #{full_working_pension}, #{family_pension}, #{position_pension}, #{longevity_pension}, #{texes}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ as seq, SCHEDULE_SEQ as scheduleSeq, SUBNAME as subname, REALNAME as realname, REGTIME as regtime FROM SCHEDULE_FILES WHERE SCHEDULE_SEQ = #{seq}
SELECT SEQ as seq, SCHEDULE_SEQ as scheduleSeq, SUBNAME as subname, REALNAME as realname, REGTIME as regtime FROM SCHEDULE_FILES WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE_FILES ( SCHEDULE_SEQ, SUBNAME, REALNAME, REGTIME ) VALUES ( #{scheduleSeq}, #{subname}, #{realname}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE PAY SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, STARTTIME = #{starttime}, ENDTIME = #{endtime}, ETC_YN = #{etcYn}, UPTIME = NOW() WHERE SEQ = #{seq} AND WRITER = #{writer}
